entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 06:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
